name: LDJam: Flying Spaghetti Monster Idle Clicker
name_original: LDJam: Flying Spaghetti Monster Idle Clicker
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 33 " You Are the Monster."

A clicker/idle game where you play the Flying Spaghetti Monster and can optimize gaining followers and get achievements to grow your religion.

Controls:

- click the monster logo on the left to gain followers.

- Click the right menu to buy upgrades.

More details on my blog about the dev process here: http://www.MollyJameson.com
